org.seasar.portlet.util
クラス RenderRequestUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.seasar.portlet.util.PortletRequestUtil
      org.seasar.portlet.util.RenderRequestUtil

public class RenderRequestUtil
extends PortletRequestUtil

This class is a utility class to use RenderRequest on Seasar2 environment.

作成者:
Shinsuke Sugaya
